metadata.notes: Job 2 Updates: Matte Clear Hood Stripes (66F) added as optional; Tire Inflator (60B) and NACS Adapter (51B) moved to optional status; BlueCruise 1-Year Plan now standard on GT.

molten_magenta_metallic_tinted_clearcoat.notes: New for 2025; Extra Charge; Not available with Bronze Appearance Package (55S)

desert_sand.notes: New for 2025; Not available on GT

rwd_std_range.availability: Standard on Select RWD, Premium RWD

eawd_std_range.availability: Standard on Select eAWD, Premium eAWD

eawd_ext_range.availability: Optional on Select eAWD, Premium eAWD

ford_co_pilot360_active_2_0.description: Standard suite includes BlueCruise readiness, 360-Degree Camera, Adaptive Cruise Control (Stop-and-Go), Lane Centering, and Parking Sensors.

trial_included.description: 90-day Complimentary Trial standard on Select/Premium; 1-Year Plan standard on GT.

1_year_plan_purchase.description: Purchase 1 year of BlueCruise access at time of order.
1_year_plan_purchase.availability: Optional on Select & Premium (Upgrades 90-day trial to 1 year)

one_time_purchase.description: One-time purchase active for a minimum of 7 years (non-transferrable).
one_time_purchase.availability: Optional on all trims (Replaces trial or 1-year plan)

mobile_power_cord.description: Switchable cord end for 120V (NEMA 5-15) or 240V (NEMA 14-50) charging.

tire_inflator_kit.description: Tire Inflator and Sealant Kit (located under load floor).
tire_inflator_kit.availability: Optional (Job 2 Change: No longer standard, unless required by state law)

front_license_plate_bracket.description: Standard in states requiring two plates, optional in others.

ford_connectivity_package_otp.description: One-time purchase for 5G Wi-Fi Hotspot, Apps, and Karaoke (min. 7 years).

series_build_rules.description: Entry trim. Standard range battery (RWD/eAWD) with eAWD Extended Range option.

comfort_package_lite.description: Heated Front Seats, Heated Steering Wheel, Memory Driver's Seat & Power-Folding Mirrors.

interior_protection_package.description: Cargo Area Cover, Cargo Floor Liner, 1st/2nd Row Floor Liners (Deletes carpet mats).

roof.65S: Black Painted Steel Roof (NA w/ Shadow Black Paint)

series_build_rules.description: Mid-level trim. Adds B&O audio, power liftgate, and available extended range RWD.

sport_appearance_package.description: 19" High Gloss Black Wheels (64N), Red Brake Calipers, Brembo Front Brakes, Sport Pedals, Red Interior Stitching, Unique Fascia/Grille.

wheels.64H: 19" Bright Machined-Face Aluminum with Sinister Bronze Pockets (NA w/ Sport Appearance 55R)

roof.43B: Panoramic Fixed-Glass Roof with Infrared Reflective (IRR) Windshield

exterior.66F: Matte Clear Hood Stripes (Optional on Sport Appearance 55R) [Job 2 New]

series_build_rules.description: Performance trim. 91kWh battery, MagneRide, and performance seating.
standard_equipment: Ford Performance Front Seats (Gray ActiveX w/ Miko Inserts)

safety_and_technology.bluecruise: Standard (1-Year Plan). Optional upgrade: One-Time Purchase (18H).

mustang_mach_e_rally.description: Includes GT Performance Upgrade (41G), 19" White Wheels (641), Michelin CrossClimate2 Tires, Rally Sport Mode, Underbody Shields, Unique Spoiler/Splitter, Rally Stripes.

bronze_appearance_package.description: 20" Sinister Bronze Painted Wheels (64F), Bronze Badging.

gt_performance_upgrade.description: +100 lb-ft Torque (700 total). Included in Rally (55Q). Optional standalone on 400A.
gt_performance_upgrade.requirements: When ordered standalone on 400A: Requires 20" Summer Tires (THE) AND (20" Wheels 64B OR Bronze Pkg 55S).

wheels.64B: 20" Machined-Face Aluminum with Carbonized Gray Pockets (NA w/ Rally 55Q or Bronze 55S)
wheels.642: 19" High Gloss Dark Carbonized Gray Wheels (Optional on Rally 55Q)

roof.43B: Panoramic Fixed-Glass Roof (Optional on GT; NA w/ Rally 55Q)

exterior.66F: Matte Clear Hood Stripes (Optional on GT) [Job 2 New]
exterior.66C: Hood and Decklid Stripe Delete (Requires Rally 55Q)
exterior.66D: Hood/Decklid Stripe & Door Graphics Delete (Requires Rally 55Q)
